amendment.description: To coordinate the provision of energy retrofitting assistance to schools.

vote.text: Amendment SA 35 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 35 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S513-514; text: CR S513-514) To coordinate the provision of energy retrofitting assistance to schools.
